medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent hypokalemia and central obesity after 21 years of hemodialysis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's dry weight was 48.1 kg in 2002 and increased to 60 kg thereafter. Symptoms progressively worsened over the years, with relapsing secondary hyperparathyroidism and notable central obesity characterized by a moon face and buffalo hump. The patient also experienced proximal muscle weakness and severe pain in both hip joints, particularly on the left side.
medical_history.past_medical_history: End-stage renal disease treated with hemodialysis since 1990; history of secondary hyperparathyroidism; parathyroidectomy performed in 2002.
medical_history.social_history: Former smoker, smoked five cigarettes daily for 20 years.
